summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5857 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 18, D. S. Maynard's Addition, being the alley between 3rd Avenue South and 4th Avenue South, from Washington Street to Main Street; by constructing or reconstructing a timber trestle and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77208, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
